se.jguru.nazgul.core.reflection.api.conversion.registry

Class Converters

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.reflection.api.conversion.registry.Converters

  • public final class Converters
extends Object
    Filter utility implementations for use in discovering Converter implementations.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB
    See Also:
    Converter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Predicate<Constructor<?>> CONVERSION_CONSTRUCTOR_FILTER
      Singleton instance of the ConversionConstructorFilter type.
      static Predicate<Method> CONVERSION_METHOD_FILTER
      Predicate finding Methods with the following properties: Annotated with @Converter Being public Not returning void or Void Having exactly one argument
      static Function<Class<?>,Tuple<SortedSet<Method>,SortedSet<Constructor<?>>>> GET_CONVERTERS
      Function which extracts all methods and constructors able to convert types within a class.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • CONVERSION_METHOD_FILTER

        public static final Predicate<Method> CONVERSION_METHOD_FILTER

        Predicate finding Methods with the following properties:

        1. Annotated with @Converter
        2. Being public
        3. Not returning void or Void
        4. Having exactly one argument

      • CONVERSION_CONSTRUCTOR_FILTER

        public static final Predicate<Constructor<?>> CONVERSION_CONSTRUCTOR_FILTER
        Singleton instance of the ConversionConstructorFilter type.

      • GET_CONVERTERS

        @NotNull
public static Function<Class<?>,Tuple<SortedSet<Method>,SortedSet<Constructor<?>>>> GET_CONVERTERS
        Function which extracts all methods and constructors able to convert types within a class. Should a null class be passed as argument, an empty Function.
